short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An Extension that block selected websites for certain time. helps with productivity, and developes healthy habits.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Web Lock - An Extension That Helps You Control Your Bad Habits. 
This tool offers a seamless solution for increasing productivity and minimizing distractions while browsing the web. With just a few clicks, you can block access to specific websites for a designated period, the extension will redirect you to motivational videos, allowing you to stay focused on your tasks without being tempted by time-consuming or distracting sites.
